description: Mapping of obsolete collection document references to their new atomic standard counterparts

mappings.old_text: *This standard (AS-STRUCTURE-ASSET-ORGANIZATION) is based on rules 1.1 through 1.4 previously defined in U-ASSETS-001 from COL-LINKING-UNIVERSAL.md.*
mappings.new_text: *This standard (AS-STRUCTURE-ASSET-ORGANIZATION) is based on rules 1.1 through 1.4 previously defined in U-ASSETS-001 (now deprecated and superseded by this standard).*
mappings.rationale: The AS-STRUCTURE-ASSET-ORGANIZATION standard itself is the atomic replacement for U-ASSETS-001

mappings.old_text: *This standard (AS-STRUCTURE-TEMPLATES-DIRECTORY) is based on rules 1.1 and 1.2 previously defined in U-TEMPLATES-DIR-001 from COL-GOVERNANCE-UNIVERSAL.md, adapting them for the new directory structure and emphasizing established naming conventions.*
mappings.new_text: *This standard (AS-STRUCTURE-TEMPLATES-DIRECTORY) is based on rules 1.1 and 1.2 previously defined in U-TEMPLATES-DIR-001 (now deprecated and superseded by this standard), adapting them for the new directory structure and emphasizing established naming conventions.*
mappings.rationale: The AS-STRUCTURE-TEMPLATES-DIRECTORY standard itself is the atomic replacement for U-TEMPLATES-DIR-001

mappings.old_text: *This policy (CS-LINKING-INTERNAL-POLICY) is based on rules 1.1, 1.3, 1.4, and 1.5 previously defined in U-INTERLINK-001 from COL-LINKING-UNIVERSAL.md. Rule 1.2 regarding syntax is now covered by [[SF-LINKS-INTERNAL-SYNTAX]].*
mappings.new_text: *This policy (CS-LINKING-INTERNAL-POLICY) is based on rules 1.1, 1.3, 1.4, and 1.5 previously defined in U-INTERLINK-001 (now deprecated and superseded by this policy). Rule 1.2 regarding syntax is now covered by [[SF-LINKS-INTERNAL-SYNTAX]].*
mappings.rationale: The CS-LINKING-INTERNAL-POLICY itself is the atomic replacement for U-INTERLINK-001

mappings.old_text: *This policy (CS-MODULARITY-TRANSCLUSION-POLICY) is based on rules 1.1, 1.2, and 1.3 previously defined in U-MODULAR-001 from COL-LINKING-UNIVERSAL.md, and provides guidance on applying the syntax defined in [[SF-TRANSCLUSION-SYNTAX]].*
mappings.new_text: *This policy (CS-MODULARITY-TRANSCLUSION-POLICY) is based on rules 1.1, 1.2, and 1.3 previously defined in U-MODULAR-001 (now deprecated and superseded by this policy), and provides guidance on applying the syntax defined in [[SF-TRANSCLUSION-SYNTAX]].*
mappings.rationale: The CS-MODULARITY-TRANSCLUSION-POLICY itself is the atomic replacement for U-MODULAR-001

mappings.old_text: *This standard (GM-MANDATE-KB-USAGE-GUIDE) is based on rules 1.1 through 1.4 previously defined in U-ONBOARDING-001 from COL-GOVERNANCE-UNIVERSAL.md, rephrasing them as mandates for the existence and content of the guide.*
mappings.new_text: *This standard (GM-MANDATE-KB-USAGE-GUIDE) is based on rules 1.1 through 1.4 previously defined in U-ONBOARDING-001 (now deprecated and superseded by this standard), rephrasing them as mandates for the existence and content of the guide.*
mappings.rationale: The GM-MANDATE-KB-USAGE-GUIDE standard itself is the atomic replacement for U-ONBOARDING-001

mappings.old_text: *This standard (GM-MANDATE-STANDARDS-GLOSSARY) is based on rules 1.1 and 1.2 previously defined in U-GLOSSARY-001 from COL-GOVERNANCE-UNIVERSAL.md, rephrasing them as mandates for the existence and content of the standards terminology glossary.*
mappings.new_text: *This standard (GM-MANDATE-STANDARDS-GLOSSARY) is based on rules 1.1 and 1.2 previously defined in U-GLOSSARY-001 (now deprecated and superseded by this standard), rephrasing them as mandates for the existence and content of the standards terminology glossary.*
mappings.rationale: The GM-MANDATE-STANDARDS-GLOSSARY standard itself is the atomic replacement for U-GLOSSARY-001

mappings.old_text: *This policy (MT-TAGGING-STRATEGY-POLICY) is based on rules 1.5, 1.6, 1.7, 1.8, and the conformance aspect of 1.9 previously defined in U-TAG-001 from COL-LINKING-UNIVERSAL.md.*
mappings.new_text: *This policy (MT-TAGGING-STRATEGY-POLICY) is based on rules 1.5, 1.6, 1.7, 1.8, and the conformance aspect of 1.9 previously defined in U-TAG-001 (now deprecated and superseded by [[MT-TAGS-IMPLEMENTATION]] and this policy).*
mappings.rationale: U-TAG-001 was split into MT-TAGS-IMPLEMENTATION and MT-TAGGING-STRATEGY-POLICY

mappings.old_text: *This standard (MT-TAGS-IMPLEMENTATION) is based on rules 1.1, 1.2, 1.3, 1.4, and part of 1.9 previously defined in U-TAG-001 from COL-LINKING-UNIVERSAL.md.*
mappings.new_text: *This standard (MT-TAGS-IMPLEMENTATION) is based on rules 1.1, 1.2, 1.3, 1.4, and part of 1.9 previously defined in U-TAG-001 (now deprecated and superseded by this standard and [[MT-TAGGING-STRATEGY-POLICY]]).*
mappings.rationale: U-TAG-001 was split into MT-TAGS-IMPLEMENTATION and MT-TAGGING-STRATEGY-POLICY

mappings.old_text: *This policy (OM-POLICY-STANDARDS-DEPRECATION) is based on rules 1.1 through 1.4 previously defined in U-DEPRECATION-001 from COL-GOVERNANCE-UNIVERSAL.md.*
